title: [pytorch] [Feature Request] SoftArgMax Function for differentiable argmax
body_html:
Softargmax is used quite many place. It can be used as a differentiable alternative to argmax function and thus comes handy at times! A brief idea about softargmax function.

What do you think about adding it into the nn Module?

I used nn.Softmax as well as torch.arange to implement it here on forums.

I can create a PR if you just mention relevant files I need to play around for the function.

body:
Softargmax is used quite many place. It can be used as a differentiable alternative to argmax function and thus comes handy at times! [A brief idea](https://bouthilx.wordpress.com/2013/04/21/a-soft-argmax/) about softargmax function.

What do you think about adding it into the nn Module?

I used `nn.Softmax` as well as `torch.arange` to implement it [here on forums](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/softargmax-in-pytorch-in-2d/17931).

I can create a PR if you just mention relevant files I need to play around for the function.
